short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to automatically fill data on cowin portal to speed up covid vaccine slot booking including captcha

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Book covid vaccine slots faster than ever!
This extension serves as a utility for booking vaccination slots on the cowin portal. This helps by letting you pre add form data like mobile number, state name, district name and then automatically filling up the data when you actually proceed for registration.

1. Install the extension
2. Click on the "Edit autofill inputs" button on the top of page in left corner.
3. Fill in the information.
4. Fill in the state name and district name. Make sure spellings are correct and words are with first letter capital.
5. Save the inputs by clicking on "Save" button.

See this page for detailed instructions on how to use: https://github.com/sushrut111/cowin-automation-extn/wiki
Terms of use: https://github.com/sushrut111/cowin-automation-extn/wiki/Terms-of-use
